value.message: Variable name 'i' used outside of a loop context; single-character variable names should be reserved for counters.
value.suggestion: Rename 'i' to a more descriptive name indicating its purpose.

value.message: Variable name 'j' used outside of a loop context; single-character variable names should be reserved for counters.
value.suggestion: Rename 'j' to a more descriptive name indicating its purpose.

value.message: No backend resource ownership verification for exported types related to permissions and workflow IDs. Risk of IDOR if APIs use these types without proper checks.
value.suggestion: Ensure all API endpoints using these types verify resource ownership and do not rely solely on client-supplied IDs. Use UUIDs and backend authorization checks.

value.message: No allow list validation for URLs in metadata or capabilities. If used for redirects, risk of open redirect vulnerability.
value.suggestion: Implement allow list validation for any URLs used in redirects. Reject or warn if URL is not in the allow list.
